sen.j: 弘安8年（1285年）の霜月騒動で14歳の執権貞時を擁する平頼綱によって安達一族の多くが滅ぼされたが、頼綱が貞時によって誅された後に安達一族の幕府復帰が認められた。
sen.e: Many people of the Adachi clan were killed by TAIRA no Yoritsuna who supported a 14-year-old shikken, Sadatoki, at Shimotsuki Incident in 1285, but the Adachi clan was subsequently pardoned to return to the political activities at the Kamakura bakufu after Yoritsuna was killed by Sadatoki.

sen.e: After Sadatoki died in 1311, Takatoki took over the head of the Hojo Tokuso (patrimonial head of the Hojo) family at the age of 9 and later became shikken at the age of 14.

sen.j: 貞時の遺言で幼主高時の後見を託された内管領の長崎高綱と、高時の舅で外戚の安達時顕が幕政の実権を握った。
sen.e: Takatsuna NAGASAKI, who was uchikanrei (chief vassal of the Tokuso) and a gurdian of young master Takatoki with Sadatoki's last wish, and Tokiaki ADACHI, who was Takatoki's father-in-law and a relative on his mother's side, held real power of the Kamakura bakufu.

sen.j: 正中 (日本)2年（1326年）3月13日、高時が病のため24歳で出家した事により、得宗家の後継を巡って内管領長崎氏と外戚安達氏の抗争である嘉暦の騒動が起こる。
sen.e: On March 13, 1326, Takatoki became a priest because of illness, which led to Kareki no Sodo (Kareki Rebellion): the power struggle between the Nagasaki family (uchikanrei) and the Adachi family (the Hojo's maternal relative) to gain control of the heir to the Tokuso family.

sen.j: 長崎氏は前年12月に高時の妾で御内人五大院宗繁の妹が産んだ長子北条邦時を押したが、大方殿と安達一門は邦時誕生の際に御産所にも高時の前にも現れず、あきらかに態度で不快を示したという。
sen.e: Though the Nagasaki clan pushed Kunitoki HOJO whom Takatoki's concubine gave birth to in December of the previous year as she was a sister of Muneshige GODAIIN, miuchibito (private vassals of the tokuso), Okatadono and the Adachi clan members did not show up at the birthplace or meet Takatoki when Kunitoki was born, thus clearly expressing their displeasure with the birth of Kunitoki.

The Nagasaki clan supported Kunitoki HOJO who was born the eldest son to a Takatoki's concubine and sister of Muneshige GODAIIN, miuchibito (private vassals of the tokuso), in the previous December, while Okatadono and the Adachi family were not happy with his birth as represented by not showing up at the birthplace or not visiting Takatoki when he was born.

sen.j: 長崎氏の推挙で北条氏庶流の北条貞顕が中継ぎとして執権となるが、大方殿と泰家が憤って貞顕を殺そうとしているという風聞が流れ、恐れをなした貞顕は出家して執権を辞任した。
sen.e: Sadaaki HOJO tentatively became shikken with recommendation of the Nagasaki clan, but he resigned shikken and became priest, because he was frightened by a rumor that Okatadono and Yasuie were angry and trying to kill Sadaaki.
